name: conspire
base: 4 paySpice THEN 5 gainSolari + 2 gainTroop + 1 drawIntrigue + 1 gainEmperorInfluence

name: heighliner
base: 6 paySpice THEN 5 gainTroop + 2 gainWater + 1 gainSpacingGuildInfluence + combat

name: desert tactics
uprising: 1 payWater THEN 1 gainTroop + 1 trashCard + 1 gainFremenInfluence + combat

name: high council
uprising: IF noHighCouncil 5 paySolari THEN gainHighCouncil AND IF haveHighCouncil 5 paySolari THEN 2 spice + 1 drawIntrigue + 3 gainTroop

name: swordmaster
uprising: IF firstSwordmaster 8 paySolari THEN gainSwordmaster AND IF secondSwordmaster 6 paySolari THEN gainSwordmaster

name: imperial privilege
uprising: IF 2 emperorInfluence 3 paySolari THEN returnAgent + 1 drawCard + (1 trashIntrigue THEN 1 drawIntrigue)

name: gather support
uprising: 2 gainTroop OR 2 paySolari THEN 2 gainTroop + 1 gainWater

name: sietch tabr
uprising: IF 2 fremenInfluence gainMakerHook + 1 gainTroop + 1 gainWater + combat OR IF 2 fremenInfluence 1 gainWater + 1 breakWall + combat

name: spice refinery
uprising: 2 gainSolari + combat OR 1 paySpice THEN 4 gainSolari + combat

name: hagga basin
uprising: 1 payWater THEN 2 gainSpice + gainMakerSpice + combat OR IF haveMakerHook 1 summonSandworm + gainMakerSpice + combat

name: sell melange
base: 2 paySpice THEN 6 gainSolari OR 3 paySpice THEN 8 gainSolari OR 4 paySpice THEN 10 gainSolari OR 5 paySpice THEN 12 gainSolari

name: deep desert
uprising: 3 payWater THEN 4 gainSpice + gainMakerSpice + combat OR IF haveMakerHook 2 summonSandworm + gainMakerSpice + combat

name: shipping
uprising: IF 2 spacingGuildInfluence 3 paySpice THEN 5 gainSolari + 1 gainAnyInfluence

name: tuek's sietch
bloodline: 1 gainSpice + gainMakerSpice + combat OR 1 drawCard + gainMakerSpice + combat
